column4: Hey can anybody help me figure out why only 3.2 gigs of my 4 gigs of RAM are discovered/available in Ubuntu (it says the same thing in my BIOS) could it be because my Intel GMA gfx card is using the other 800? I'm running 64-bit Ubuntu
yes your intel gma gfx card will be using some of your main ram
yea but 800 i guess i can figure it out thru bios and lower that
on my server which has onboard video it is adjustable and ranges from 16mb - 256mb
